datacheckitem.NAME: 对象ID记录重复性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 数据中存在ID相同的重复记录

datacheckitem.NAME: 对象ID记录重复性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 数据中存在ID相同的重复记录
datacheckitem.SQL: select 'HD_DIVIDER_NODE_INDEX' FileName, id RepeatId, count(*) RecoordCount from HD_DIVIDER_NODE_INDEX group by id,divider_id having count(*)>1;

datacheckitem.NAME: 几何数据重复性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 数据中存在几何对象完全相同的重复记录
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT fileName tblName FROM ARCSHAPE_METADATA WHERE SHPType<>0 and (fileName<>'HD_DIVIDER_NODE_INDEX' or fileName<>'HD_DIVIDER_NODE'); SELECT rp.FileName, RepeatGeometryIds, T.TASKID, LocalX, LocalY FROM (SELECT '{tblName}' FileName, min(r.id) localid, group_concat(id) RepeatGeometryIds FROM {tblName} r JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT geometry FROM {tblName} GROUP BY geometry HAVING count(*)>1) g ON r.geometry=g.geometry GROUP BY r.geometry) rp JOIN (SELECT min(FID) minid, X LocalX, Y LocalY FROM {tblName}_GEOCOORDS GROUP BY FID) b ON b.minid=rp.localid LEFT JOIN HD_AUX_TASKID T ON T.ID=B.MINID AND T.FILENAME='{tblName}' COLLATE NOCASE;

datacheckitem.NAME: 几何数据重复性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 数据中存在几何对象完全相同的重复记录

datacheckitem.NAME: 多边形形态错误
datacheckitem.INFO: 多边形对象至少要包含4个点,且首尾点坐标相等构成闭合环
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT FileName||'_GEOCOORDS' tblName FROM ARCSHAPE_METADATA WHERE SHPType=15; SELECT '{tblName}' TBLNAME, FID, COUNT(*) NUMPOINTS FROM {tblName} GROUP BY FID HAVING NUMPOINTS<4;

datacheckitem.NAME: 几何数据坐标值异常检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 几何数据中存在坐标值X(0~360) 或 坐标值Y(-90~90) 或坐标值Z(马里亚纳海沟-11034m~珠穆朗玛峰8848m)异常的情况

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道线不存在于车道组中
datacheckitem.INFO: 存在孤立的车道线，其没有包含在车道组中
datacheckitem.SQL: select id dividerid from hd_divider where id not in (select divider_l dividerid from hd_lane union select divider_r dividerid from hd_lane);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道组未关联道路或关联道路无效
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_lane_group数据有缺失或错误,车道组LaneGroup未关联道路Road或关联道路Road无效
datacheckitem.SQL: select id lanegroupid, road_id roadid from hd_lane_group where road_id=-1 or road_id not in(select id from road);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道组有效性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: 表HD_LANE_GROUP中的车道组在表hd_r_lane_group中无法找到
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT ID, ROAD_ID ROADID FROM HD_LANE_GROUP WHERE ID IN(SELECT ID FROM HD_LANE_GROUP EXCEPT SELECT LG_ID FROM HD_R_LANE_GROUP);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道未关联车道组
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_r_lane_group数据有缺失,车道Lane未关联车道组LaneGroup
datacheckitem.SQL: select id laneid from hd_lane where id not in (select lane_id from hd_r_lane_group);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道关联多个车道组
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_r_lane_group数据有错误,车道Lane关联多个车道组LaneGroup
datacheckitem.SQL: select lane_id laneid, group_concat(LG_ID) lanegroupids from hd_r_lane_group where lane_id in(select distinct lane_id laneid from hd_r_lane_group group by lane_id having count(*)>1) group by lane_id;

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道关联车道线无效
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_divider数据有缺失,车道Lane关联左右车道线Divider无效

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道线关联节点无效
datacheckitem.INFO: 表HD_DIVIDERNODE数据有缺失,车道线Divider关联的节点DividerNode编号在HD_DIVIDERNODE表无法找到
datacheckitem.SQL: select * from (SELECT distinct fdnode nodeid FROM HD_DIVIDER union select distinct tdnode from hd_divider) where nodeid not in(select id from hd_divider_node);

datacheckitem.NAME: 两个车道关联的左右车道线完全一致
datacheckitem.INFO: 表HD_LANE数据错误,非出入口两条车道Lane关联的左右车道线Divider完全相同
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT L.* FROM (select a.id firstLaneId, b.id secLaneId from hd_lane a join hd_lane b on a.id<>b.id and ((a.divider_l=b.divider_l and a.divider_r=b.divider_r) or (a.divider_l=b.divider_r and a.divider_r=b.divider_l))) L JOIN HD_LANE_GEOTOPO A ON L.firstLaneId=A.FID JOIN HD_LANE_GEOTOPO B ON L.secLaneId=B.FID AND NOT (A.SGEONODEID=B.SGEONODEID OR A.SGEONODEID=B.EGEONODEID OR A.EGEONODEID=B.EGEONODEID OR A.EGEONODEID=B.SGEONODEID);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道孤立不连通
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_lane_connectivity数据有丢失,车道Lane是孤立存在,车道连通性存在错误
datacheckitem.SQL: select id laneid from hd_lane where id not in (select distinct flane_id from hd_lane_connectivity group by flane_id union select distinct tlane_id from hd_lane_connectivity group by tlane_id);

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道形态连通的关系丢失
datacheckitem.INFO: 拓扑形态连接的两条Lane在HD_LANE_CONNECTIVITY中不存在导致拓扑关系丢失

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道拓扑关系无效
datacheckitem.INFO: HD_LANE_CONNECTIVITY中存在拓扑关系的两条Lane在形态上不连通,如果连接点XY相等需确认Z值是否相等

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道线冗余错误
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_divider数据冗余,存在多条车道线Divider几何形态完全一致的情况

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道冗余错误
datacheckitem.INFO: 表hd_lane数据冗余,存在多条车道Lane几何形态完全一致的情况

datacheckitem.NAME: Lane或Divider分组形态错误
datacheckitem.INFO: Lane或Divider几何首尾点完全相同，导致NDS编译无法建立LaneConnectorId拓扑
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT FileName fileName, FileName||'_GEOCOORDS' tblName FROM ARCSHAPE_METADATA WHERE SHPType=13 AND (FileName LIKE '%lane%' OR FileName LIKE '%divider%') COLLATE NOCASE; SELECT DISTINCT '{fileName}' FILENAME, group_concat(FID) FEATUREIDS FROM (SELECT se.FID, s.x sx, s.y sy, s.z sz, e.x ex, e.y ey, e.z ez FROM (SELECT FID, MIN(indexpoint) sptid, MAX(indexpoint) eptid FROM {tblName} GROUP BY FID) se LEFT JOIN {tblName} s ON se.FID=s.FID AND se.sptid=s.indexpoint LEFT JOIN {tblName} e ON se.FID=e.FID AND se.eptid=e.indexpoint) GROUP BY sx,sy,sz,ex,ey,ez HAVING COUNT(*)>1;

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道LaneType检查
datacheckitem.INFO: HD_LANE_ATTRIBUTE表存在一条Lane有多个LANETYPE的情况
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT LANE_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT lane_id, lanetype FROM HD_LANE_ATTRIBUTE GROUP BY lane_id, lanetype HAVING count(*)>1) GROUP BY lane_id HAVING count(*)>1;

datacheckitem.NAME: 车道编号检查
datacheckitem.INFO: HD_LANE表中存在无效车道号Lane_No不在(0~16)范围
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT ID, Lane_no LaneNO FROM HD_LANE where lane_no>16 or lane_no<0;

datacheckitem.NAME: DIVIDER对应DA属性检查
datacheckitem.INFO: DIVIDER的DA属性错误：无DA,首点无DA,SPIDX超限
datacheckitem.SQL: SELECT ID, NULL SPIDX, 'Divider无DA' INFO FROM(SELECT ID FROM HD_DIVIDER EXCEPT SELECT DIVIDER_ID FROM HD_DIVIDER_ATTRIBUTE) UNION SELECT DIVIDER_ID, MIN(SPIDX), 'Divider首点无DA' FROM HD_DIVIDER_ATTRIBUTE GROUP BY DIVIDER_ID HAVING MIN(SPIDX)>0 UNION SELECT DIVIDERID, SPIDX, 'DA SPIDX值超限' FROM (SELECT DIVIDER_ID DIVIDERID, SPIDX FROM HD_DIVIDER_ATTRIBUTE WHERE SPIDX<0 UNION SELECT DIVIDER_ID, SPIDX FROM HD_DIVIDER_ATTRIBUTE DA JOIN (SELECT FID, MAX(INDEXPOINT) NUMPT FROM HD_DIVIDER_GEOCOORDS GROUP BY FID) DN ON DA.DIVIDER_ID=DN.FID AND DA.SPIDX>NUMPT) UNION SELECT DIVIDER_ID,SPIDX, '单个DividerNode上有多个DA' FROM HD_DIVIDER_ATTRIBUTE GROUP BY DIVIDER_ID,SPIDX HAVING COUNT(*)>1 ORDER BY INFO;

datacheckitem.NAME: 定位目标与道路的关联关系
datacheckitem.INFO: 检查定位目标是否关联了道路
datacheckitem.SQL: select 'HD_TRAFFICSIGN' FileName, T.ID ID from HD_TRAFFICSIGN T except select 'HD_TRAFFICSIGN', L.LO_ID from HD_R_LO_ROAD L union select 'HD_POINT' FileName, T.ID ID from HD_POINT T except select 'HD_POINT', L.LO_ID from HD_R_LO_ROAD L union select 'HD_POLYGON' FileName,T.ID ID from HD_POLYGON T except select 'HD_POLYGON', L.LO_ID from HD_R_LO_ROAD L union select 'HD_POLYLINE' FileName, T.ID ID from HD_POLYLINE T except select 'HD_POLYLINE', L.LO_ID from HD_R_LO_ROAD L union select 'HD_TRAFFIC_LIGHT' FileName, T.ID ID from HD_TRAFFIC_LIGHT T except select 'HD_TRAFFIC_LIGHT', L.LO_ID from HD_R_LO_ROAD L;
